headline.main: Trump a New Test for German-Israeli 'Special Relationship'
headline.print_headline: Trump a New Test for German-Israeli 'Special Relationship'

lead_paragraph: In 2008, the 60th anniversary of the state of Israel, Angela Merkel delivered a speech in the Knesset in which she described relations between Germany and Israel as "excellent".
snippet: In 2008, the 60th anniversary of the state of Israel, Angela Merkel delivered a speech in the Knesset in which she described relations between Germany and Israel as "excellent"....
